mapper.insert: insert into student(userid, userpwd, username, userbirth, usergender, useraddress, usertel, useremail) values (#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{userbirth}, #{usergender}, #{useraddress}, #{usertel}, #{useremail})
